blogPost.excerpt: Is Woofbuzz just another dog training app? No. It is a full platform that will provide answers to ALL of your canine queries. Yes, we provide free behavioral content, all originally illustrated, but Woofbuzz goes a lot further than this.
blogPost.body: Is Woofbuzz just another dog training app? No. It is a full platform that will provide answers to ALL of your canine queries. Yes, we provide free behavioral content, all originally illustrated, but Woofbuzz goes a lot further than this.
blogPost.title: Woofbuzz - Provides tools to ensure your dog’s daily needs are met
blogPost.author: Alexander Adam

localize.description: Woofbuzz只是另一款训练狗的应用程序吗？不是的。这是一个完整的平台，将为您的所有犬类查询提供答案。是的，我们提供免费的行为内容，都是最初的插图，但Woofbuzz做得更远。
localize.tagline: 提供工具以确保您的狗狗的日常需要得到满足

localize.description: Woofbuzz只是另一款訓練狗的應用程序嗎？不是的。這是一個完整的平臺，將爲您的所有犬類查詢提供答案。是的，我們提供免費的行爲內容，都是最初的插圖，但Woofbuzz做得更遠。
localize.tagline: 提供工具以確保您的狗狗的日常需要得到滿足

previous.excerpt: Fastival is an intermittent fasting app which supports you to take breaks from eating to feel healthier and lose weight. Intermittent fasting boosts your immune system by giving your body time to digest food better and in turn strengthen the body’s defenses.
previous.title: Fastival - Discover the power of intermittent fasting

localize.description: Fastival是一个间歇性的禁食应用程序，它支持你从进食中抽出时间来感觉更健康和减肥。间歇性禁食让你的身体有时间更好地消化食物，进而增强身体的防御能力，从而增强你的免疫系统。
localize.tagline: 发现间歇性禁食的力量

localize.description: Fastival是一個間歇性的禁食應用程序，它支持你從進食中抽出時間來感覺更健康和減肥。間歇性禁食讓你的身體有時間更好地消化食物，進而增強身體的防禦能力，從而增強你的免疫系統。
localize.tagline: 發現間歇性禁食的力量

next.title: The Prediction Game - Predict what'll happen in 2021, win a $1k fund :)
